snippet.title: Mr. DRILLER DrillLand – Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Dig your way to victory with Mr. DRILLER DrillLand! #MDDL


Conquer the 5 attractions, compete with friends, or use Casual Mode to dig at your leisurely pace! #MrDRILLER DrillLand arrives June 25th, 2020 for #NintendoSwitch and Steam!


Follow Bandai Namco Entertainment: 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bandainamcous/?hl=en
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BandaiNamcoUS
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BandaiNamcoUS/
Tumblr: http://bandainamcous.tumblr.com/
Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/bandainamcous
